blogPost.excerpt: Follab is a platform for collect, organize and analyze customer feedback. No more outdated spreadsheets, caothic Trello boards or try to keep track of everything in Slack.
blogPost.body: Follab is a platform for collect, organize and analyze customer feedback. No more outdated spreadsheets, caothic Trello boards or try to keep track of everything in Slack.
blogPost.title: Follab - Capture, organize, and analyze customer feedback
blogPost.author: Matias Carpintini.

localize.description: Follab是一个收集、整理和分析客户反馈的平台。不再有过时的电子表格、caothic的Trello板或试图在Slack中跟踪一切。
localize.tagline: 收集、整理、分析客户反馈

localize.description: Follab是一個收集、整理和分析客戶反饋的平臺。不再有過時的電子表格、caothic的Trello板或試圖在Slack中跟蹤一切。
localize.tagline: 收集、整理、分析客戶反饋

previous.excerpt: BlockSurvey is an online form and survey platform with a focus on privacy and security. Think of it as an alternative to SurveyMonkey, Typeform, Google Forms but with a focus on privacy and security. It is powered by Stacks Blockchain.
previous.title: BlockSurvey 2.0 - Secure forms & surveys, powered by Stacks blockchain

localize.description: BlockSurvey是一个注重隐私和安全的在线表格和调查平台。把它看作是SurveyMonkey、Typeform、Google Forms的替代品，但注重隐私和安全。它由Stacks Blockchain提供支持。
localize.tagline: 由Stacks区块链提供支持的安全表格和调查问卷。

localize.description: BlockSurvey是一個注重隱私和安全的在線表格和調查平臺。把它看作是SurveyMonkey、Typeform、Google Forms的替代品，但注重隱私和安全。它由Stacks Blockchain提供支持。
localize.tagline: 由Stacks區塊鏈提供支持的安全表格和調查問卷。

next.excerpt: Zyla is the fastest end-to-end headless commerce stack that blends cutting-edge content management and commerce tools that can accept payments and ship worldwide instantly once deployed to Vercel.
next.title: Zyla - The fastest headless commerce stack on earth ⚡

localize.description: Zyla是最快的端到端无头商务堆栈，它融合了最先进的内容管理和商务工具，一旦部署到Vercel，就可以接受支付并立即向全球发货。
